Welcome to our community of CheckMates! 👋🏻 We're grateful to have you on board to combat misinformation and scams. 🙇‍♀️🙇🏻 We'd love to get to know you better - could you *reply to this message* and share your name with us? (Reply to this message by swiping right)!

Thank you and welcome, {{name}}! We're thrilled to have you on board as we work together to combat misinformation and scams.😊 By using the CheckMate bot, you are accepting our privacy policy which can be found here: https://bit.ly/checkmate-privacy

To ensure you're equipped with the necessary skills to identify misinformation and scams, let's start with a quick quiz. 📝 Simply follow the link (https://bit.ly/checkmates-quiz) to take the quiz. Once you've completed it, come back to this chat and click on "I've done the quiz!" to notify me. Let's get started! 🤖

Awesome! Now that you know how to identify misinformation and scams, you are ready to help us combat them! 🙌🏻 If you haven't already, do join this WhatsApp group (https://bit.ly/checkmates-groupchat) that brings together all the other CheckMates and the core product team for updates and feedback. If you're looking for resources, you can visit our wiki page (https://bit.ly/checkmates-wiki). Thanks again for joining our community of CheckMates. Enjoy! 👋🏻🤖
Please assess the veracity of the claim(s) in this message on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 means the claim(s) are entirely false, and 5 means the claim(s) are entirely true.
You have *{{num_outstanding}} remaining messages* to assess. Would you like to be sent the next one in line?
Got it👍! Please hold for another selection.
Which of these subcategories best describes this message?
Which of these categories best describes this message?
Got it! Your response has been recorded. Thank you for playing your part in the fight against scams and misinformation, one message at a time! 💪
Great, you have no further messages to assess. Keep it up!💪
No problem! If you wish to come back and assess the message, you may do so by clicking the 'yes' button. See you soon!😊
Got it👍! Please hold for another poll to vote on how true the message is.

At this time, {{%voted}}% of our CheckMates have assessed and voted on this message. The majority think that this is {{prelim_assessment}}{{info_placeholder}}. 

NOTE: This is a *preliminary result*. We aim to provide you with a more credible final result as soon as more of our CheckMates have voted, or when 24 hours has lapsed since you sent in your message.

目前，{{%voted}}%的查哥查妹已经对这条短信进行投票评估。大多数人认为这条短信{{prelim_assessment}}{{info_placeholder}}。

注意：这只是初步结果。我们将在更多的查哥查妹投票后，或在您提交短信的24小时内，为您提供最终的结果。

At this time, {{%voted}}% of our CheckMates have assessed and voted on this message. Unfortunately, our CheckMates either have not reached any clear consensus, or are still unsure how to assess the message at this time.

If you haven't done so, you could send in the message with more context, e.g. sending in a screenshot containing the sender's number.

目前，{{%voted}}%的查哥查妹已经对这条短信进行投票评估。但是，他们无法达成一致，或缺乏足够的信息进行评估。

如果您能提供更多信息，例如发信人电话号码或截图，将有助于我们更好地评估。

Thanks for waiting! Our network of trusted CheckMate volunteers is still assessing your message.

You may press the button below to see how our volunteers have rated your message so far. However, *do interpret this preliminary rating with caution* as the final result may differ. 

We appreciate your patience and hope to deliver the final result soon!

感谢您的耐心等待！查哥查妹正在对您提交的短信进行投票评估。我们将在足够多的查哥查妹投票后，为您提供最终结果。

在最终结果发布之前，您可以点击“获取初步结果”。请注意，初步结果和最终结果可能存在差异，应谨慎解读初步结果。我们感谢您的耐心，并会尽快提供最终结果！💪🏼
CheckMate has already provided a final response to this message.
查友已经对这条短信做出最终回应。
No worries! We will not send your message to ScamShield. Thank you for sharing this message with us, and for keeping Singapore safe!
我们不会将您的短信发送给ScamShield。感谢您与我们分享这条短信，也感谢您对新加坡网络安全的支持和贡献。

Hi! Thanks for using CheckMate. 🙏🏻
您好！感谢您使用查友。🙏🏻

Nice! Just send/forward us the message. We'll help you check and/or report it! ✅✅

If you like, you can also send in screenshots 📷 or other images 🖼️! This can help to capture the sender's number, or a full conversation, which could help our CheckMates' assessment.

Do note that CheckMate *checks dubious messages and tells you whether you can trust them. It cannot converse with you or answer questions*.

One last thing: by continuing to use CheckMate, you're agreeing to our privacy policy, which can be found at https://checkmate.sg/privacy-policy. In short, we only collect the messages sent to us and your number to facilitate a response!

好的！您只需将短信发送给查友，我们会对此进行评估！✅✅

除了文字信息，您也可以发送截图📷或其他图片🖼️！这有助于查哥查妹通过发信人号码或完整的对话内容做出评判。

请注意，查友只评估您发送的短信，它无法与您进行对话。

最后，使用查友即表示您已同意我们的隐私政策。您可在 https://checkmate.sg/privacy-policy 查看我们的隐私政策。基本上，我们只收集您发送的消息以及您的手机号码，以便回复您！

📍 We Miss You! 👀 Hey {{name}}, it looks like you've been inactive for the past {{num_days}} days. Just a friendly reminder: if we don't see any activity for 7 days, your access as a checker will be temporarily deactivated. If you need any help or have any questions, feel free to ask in the Q&A channel of our Checker's Telegram group - we're here to help! 😊

📍 Temporary Deactivation Notice Hi {{name}}, Your access as a checker has been temporarily deactivated due to inactivity. No worries though - simply press the button below to get back to checking! 🚀 We're excited to see you back in action soon 😊

📍 CheckMate Fact-checker Programme Status Hi {{name}}, Thank you so much for your time and dedication during the CheckMate programme. While you've given it your best, it seems we haven't quite met the criteria needed to continue as a volunteer in our checking crew. We'd love to hear about your experience - your feedback will help us improve! Please take a moment to fill out this quick survey: As part of this process, you'll also be removed from the Checkers' Crew Telegram chat, and will not receive future messages to vote on. We appreciate your understanding and wish you all the best moving forward 💛 Thank you for your contribution, The CheckMate Team

📍 Congratulations, You've Graduated! 🎉 Hi {{name}}, Huge congratulations on completing the CheckMate checkers' programme! You've worked hard, and completed the following: No. of messages voted on: {{num_messages}} Accuracy: {{accuracy}} No. of new users referred: {{num_referred}} No. of messages reported: {{num_reported}} Your dedication has clearly paid off! 🎓 We'd love to hear about your experience - please take a moment to fill out our survey To generate your official completion certificate, just press the button below. Thank you for being part of the Checkers' Crew. We're so proud of you! 💪

📍 Welcome to the Checkers' Crew! 👋 Let's welcome our new checkers!🎉 {{names}} We're so excited to have you join our fact-checking family. This group is your hub for connecting with fellow Checkers, sharing tips, and staying up to date with important updates. If you ever feel unsure about anything, don't hesitate to reach out or ask in our Q&A channel. We're all here to support each other and improve our skills together 🤗 Let's get started!
Hello! 👋 Thanks for sending this in! Give us a minute while our AI assesses this message 🤖
你好！👋 感谢你的提交！请稍等片刻，我们的人工智能🤖正在评估这条消息。

It seems there isn't any content in this message that we can help assess.

Otherwise if you feel we have misunderstood you, please press the button below.{{submissions_remaining}}

如果您认为我们理解有误，请点击下方按钮。

我们将尽快发送对于原始消息的人工评估结果。

This message appears to contain controversial views. At CheckMate, our checks are designed with harm prevention in mind, prioritizing speed and clarity. While we aim to provide reliable results, controversial topics requiring deeper nuance may be less suited to our process.

If you understand these limitations and still wish to view the result, please click the button below to proceed.
这条消息似乎包含具有争议的观点。查友做事实核查的主要目的是快速、准确地判断出有害内容，并防止其更广泛的传播。我们致力于提供可靠的结果，但我们目前的流程可能无法完全适用于需要更深入分析的争议性话题。

We appreciate your understanding and continued support as we work to serve everyone as efficiently as possible.
